page.title: 04NOTTINGHAM-ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {CINEMA.}A cinema is a big building with 4 or 5 rooms in it.In each room there is a big screen and they show films on it.In each room they show a different film and you have to pay to get in. These are two cinemas;the A.B.C. and the Odeon.{DISCOS.}At discos people play music so you can dance.They have flashing lights and they make patterns on the wall.Here are a few discos in Nottingham;Palais de Dance, Digby's,Isabella's,and Rock City.{THEATRE.}A theatre is a building where people go to watch plays and operas.In Nottingham there a few theatres and here are some;The Royal Concert Hall,The Theatre Royal,and the Nottingham Playhouse.The price in most theatres is Â£4.50 to see a play. We can also go to bowling alleys, ice skating and football matches.
